sentences.en: A man's three - piece suit includes a jacket, trousers, and a waistcoat.
sentences.cn: 男人的三 件套 服装包括上衣 、 长裤和背心.

sentences.en: A red waistcoat, marking her as a Second Assistant Librarian.
sentences.cn: 红色马甲, 意味着她是二级图书管理员助理.

sentences.en: A tree - piece suit consists of trousers, jacket and waistcoat.
sentences.cn: 三 件套 西装包括裤子 、 上衣和背心.

sentences.en: A waistcoat acts as an accent when worn beneath a jacket.
sentences.cn: 背心穿在上衣里面作为一种特色.

sentences.en: After sleeping in the sledge and dining in the kitchen, to sit in an arm-chair in clean linen, in thin boots, with a chain on one’s waistcoat, is such luxury!
sentences.cn: 经过在雪撬上睡觉和在厨房吃饭后，穿着干净的亚麻布衣服，细薄的靴子坐在靠背椅里，某人的马甲上还挂着表链，这一切是多么的奢侈了啊！

sentences.en: At this dismal news, I twisted the only button on my waistcoat round and round.
sentences.cn: 一听到这个扫兴的消息, 急得我扭着背心上仅剩的那一颗钮扣.

sentences.en: His waistcoat was riding up over his stomach.
sentences.cn: 他的马甲收到腹部以上了.

sentences.en: In the cartoon, John Bull appears as a short, stocky figure wearing a waistcoat with the British flag on.
sentences.cn: 在漫画中，“约翰牛”常以矮小健壮的形象出现，身穿印有英国国旗的背心。

sentences.en: It isn't the waistcoat that I look at. It is the heart.
sentences.cn: 我看人倒不是凭衣裳,是凭良心.

sentences.en: It was imaginative waistcoat with exceedingly fanciful glass buttons.
sentences.cn: 花哨的坎肩上配搭着一些光怪陆离的玻璃钮扣.

sentences.en: Long gown, mandarin jacket and waistcoat were the typical Manchurian clothes.
sentences.cn: 长袍 、 马褂、马甲为满族人的主要服装.

sentences.en: Now the waistcoat; aha right again!
sentences.cn: 再请穿上背心, 啊哈,又很合适.

sentences.en: Please let your camera waistcoat pass through X - ray after taking it off.
sentences.cn: 请将您的摄影背心脱下来,放在传送带上.

sentences.en: She wore a lovely tiara but the groom, not to be outdone, had on a very smart embroidered waistcoat.
sentences.cn: 她戴了一顶漂亮的冕状头饰，而新郎也毫不逊色，身着一件非常讲究的刺绣西服马甲。

sentences.en: The checks in the waistcoat are but the wires of the cage.
sentences.cn: 背心上的方格子不过是笼子上的铜丝而已.

sentences.en: The ends of my waistcoat won't meet.
sentences.cn: 我的背心太小了,扣不上.

sentences.en: The lace and starch crumpled against his waistcoat and trousers.
sentences.cn: 花边和浆硬的衣服贴紧他的背心和裤子.

sentences.en: You will then have only a pair of trousers, a waistcoat, a hat and a coat.
sentences.cn: 您只剩下一条长裤，一件背心，一顶帽子和一件短上衣了。

trans.tran_en: a piece of clothing without sleeves that has buttons down the front and is worn over a shirt, often under a jacket as part of a man’s suit
